fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Make someone a random adjective each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the start of each day, generate a random adjective at https://randomwordgenerator.com/adjective.php. The target of your ability the following night permanently becomes that attribute, which is a status effect that the host comes up with and tells you as the adjective is generated.
